original: Parivāra
Bhikkhuvibhaṅga
Dutiyabhāga
1.10 Katāpattivāra
1. Pārājikakaṇḍa
Methunaṁ dhammaṁ paṭisevanapaccayā kati āpattiyo āpajjati?
Methunaṁ dhammaṁ paṭisevanapaccayā catasso āpattiyo āpajjati—
akkhāyite sarīre methunaṁ dhammaṁ paṭisevati, āpatti pārājikassa;
analyzed: ▁akkh ā y ite ▁sarīr e ▁methun aṃ ▁dhammaṃ ▁paṭisev ati ▁āpatti ▁pārājik assa

original: yebhuyyena khāyite sarīre methunaṁ dhammaṁ paṭisevati, āpatti thullaccayassa;
analyzed: ▁yebhuyy ena ▁kh ā y ite ▁sarīr e ▁methun aṃ ▁dhammaṃ ▁paṭisev ati ▁āpatti ▁thullaccay assa

original: vaṭṭakate mukhe acchupantaṁ aṅgajātaṁ paveseti, āpatti dukkaṭassa;
analyzed: ▁vaṭṭ akat e ▁mukh e ▁a cch up antaṃ ▁aṃg a jāt aṃ ▁paves eti ▁āpatti ▁dukkaṭassa

original: jatumaṭṭhake pācittiyaṁ—
methunaṁ dhammaṁ paṭisevanapaccayā imā catasso āpattiyo āpajjati.
Adinnaṁ ādiyanapaccayā kati āpattiyo āpajjati?
Adinnaṁ ādiyanapaccayā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.
Pañcamāsakaṁ vā atirekapañcamāsakaṁ vā agghanakaṁ adinnaṁ theyyasaṅkhātaṁ ādiyati, āpatti pārājikassa;
analyzed: ▁pañca mās akaṃ ▁vā ▁atirek ap añca mās akaṃ ▁vā ▁agg han akaṃ ▁adinn aṃ ▁theyy asaṃkhāt aṃ ▁ādi yati ▁āpatti ▁pārājik assa

original: atirekamāsakaṁ vā ūnapañcamāsakaṁ vā agghanakaṁ adinnaṁ theyyasaṅkhātaṁ ādiyati, āpatti thullaccayassa;
analyzed: ▁atirek a mās akaṃ ▁vā ▁ ūn ap añca mās akaṃ ▁vā ▁agg han akaṃ ▁adinn aṃ ▁theyy asaṃkhāt aṃ ▁ādi yati ▁āpatti ▁thullaccay assa

original: māsakaṁ vā ūnamāsakaṁ vā agghanakaṁ adinnaṁ theyyasaṅkhātaṁ ādiyati, āpatti dukkaṭassa—
analyzed: ▁mās akaṃ ▁vā ▁ ūn a mās akaṃ ▁vā ▁agg han akaṃ ▁adinn aṃ ▁theyy asaṃkhāt aṃ ▁ādi yati ▁āpatti ▁dukkaṭassa

original: adinnaṁ ādiyanapaccayā imā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.
Sañcicca manussaviggahaṁ jīvitā voropanapaccayā kati āpattiyo āpajjati?
analyzed: ▁sa ñc icc a ▁manuss a viggah aṃ ▁jīvit ā ▁vo rop an apaccayā ▁kati ▁āpattiyo ▁āpajjati

original: Sañcicca manussaviggahaṁ jīvitā voropanapaccayā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.
analyzed: ▁sa ñc icc a ▁manuss a viggah aṃ ▁jīvit ā ▁vo rop an apaccayā ▁tisso ▁āpattiyo ▁āpajjati

original: Manussaṁ odissa opātaṁ khaṇati “papatitvā marissatī”ti, āpatti dukkaṭassa;
analyzed: ▁manuss aṃ ▁ o di ssa ▁ o pāt aṃ ▁khaṇ ati ▁pa pat itvā ▁mar issatīti ▁āpatti ▁dukkaṭassa

original: papatite dukkhā vedanā uppajjati, āpatti thullaccayassa;
marati, āpatti pārājikassa—
sañcicca manussaviggahaṁ jīvitā voropanapaccayā imā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.
analyzed: ▁sa ñc icc a ▁manuss a viggah aṃ ▁jīvit ā ▁vo rop an apaccayā ▁imā ▁tisso ▁āpattiyo ▁āpajjati

original: Asantaṁ abhūtaṁ uttarimanussadhammaṁ ullapanapaccayā kati āpattiyo āpajjati?
analyzed: ▁as antaṃ ▁ abhūtaṃ ▁uttari manuss adhamm aṃ ▁ ul lapan apaccayā ▁kati ▁āpattiyo ▁āpajjati

original: Asantaṁ abhūtaṁ uttarimanussadhammaṁ ullapanapaccayā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati—
analyzed: ▁as antaṃ ▁ abhūtaṃ ▁uttari manuss adhamm aṃ ▁ ul lapan apaccayā ▁tisso ▁āpattiyo ▁āpajjati

original: pāpiccho icchāpakato asantaṁ abhūtaṁ uttarimanussadhammaṁ ullapati, āpatti pārājikassa;
analyzed: ▁pāp icch o ▁icch ā pakat o ▁as antaṃ ▁ abhūtaṃ ▁uttari manuss adhamm aṃ ▁u ll a pati ▁āpatti ▁pārājik assa

original: “yo te vihāre vasati so bhikkhu arahā”ti bhaṇati, paṭivijānantassa āpatti thullaccayassa;
analyzed: ▁yo ▁te ▁vihār e ▁vas ati ▁so ▁bhikkhu ▁arahā ti ▁bhaṇ ati ▁paṭi vi jān antassa ▁āpatti ▁thullaccay assa

original: na paṭivijānantassa āpatti dukkaṭassa—
asantaṁ abhūtaṁ uttarimanussadhammaṁ ullapanapaccayā imā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.
analyzed: ▁as antaṃ ▁ abhūtaṃ ▁uttari manuss adhamm aṃ ▁ ul lapan apaccayā ▁imā ▁tisso ▁āpattiyo ▁āpajjati

original: Cattāro pārājikā niṭṭhitā.
2. Saṅghādisesakaṇḍādi
Upakkamitvā asucimocanapaccayā kati āpattiyo āpajjati?
analyzed: ▁upa kkam itvā ▁asuci mo c an apaccayā ▁kati ▁āpattiyo ▁āpajjati

original: Upakkamitvā asucimocanapaccayā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati—
analyzed: ▁upa kkam itvā ▁asuci mo c an apaccayā ▁tisso ▁āpattiyo ▁āpajjati

original: ceteti upakkamati muccati, āpatti saṅghādisesassa;
ceteti upakkamati na muccati, āpatti thullaccayassa;
payoge dukkaṭaṁ—
upakkamitvā asucimocanapaccayā imā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.
analyzed: ▁upa kkam itvā ▁asuci mo c an apaccayā ▁imā ▁tisso ▁āpattiyo ▁āpajjati

original: Kāyasaṁsaggaṁ samāpajjanapaccayā kati āpattiyo āpajjati?
analyzed: ▁kāya saṃ sagg aṃ ▁samā pajj an apaccayā ▁kati ▁āpattiyo ▁āpajjati

original: Kāyasaṁsaggaṁ samāpajjanapaccayā pañca āpattiyo āpajjati—
analyzed: ▁kāya saṃ sagg aṃ ▁samā pajj an apaccayā ▁pañca ▁āpattiyo ▁āpajjati

original: avassutā bhikkhunī avassutassa purisapuggalassa adhakkhakaṁ ubbhajāṇumaṇḍalaṁ gahaṇaṁ sādiyati, āpatti pārājikassa;
analyzed: ▁ava ssu tā ▁bhikkhunī ▁a vass ut assa ▁puris apuggal assa ▁a dha kkha kaṃ ▁u bbh a j ā ṇu maṇḍal aṃ ▁gahaṇ aṃ ▁sādiy ati ▁āpatti ▁pārājik assa

original: bhikkhu kāyena kāyaṁ āmasati, āpatti saṅghādisesassa;
kāyena kāyapaṭibaddhaṁ āmasati, āpatti thullaccayassa;
kāyapaṭibaddhena kāyapaṭibaddhaṁ āmasati, āpatti dukkaṭassa;
aṅgulipatodake pācittiyaṁ—
kāyasaṁsaggaṁ samāpajjanapaccayā imā pañca āpattiyo āpajjati.
analyzed: ▁kāya saṃ sagg aṃ ▁samā pajj an apaccayā ▁imā ▁pañca ▁āpattiyo ▁āpajjati

original: Mātugāmaṁ duṭṭhullāhi vācāhi obhāsanapaccayā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati—
vaccamaggaṁ passāvamaggaṁ ādissa vaṇṇampi bhaṇati avaṇṇampi bhaṇati, āpatti saṅghādisesassa;
analyzed: ▁va cca magg aṃ ▁pass āva magg aṃ ▁ādi ssa ▁vaṇṇ ampi ▁bhaṇ ati ▁ avaṇṇ ampi ▁bhaṇ ati ▁āpatti ▁saṃghādises assa

original: vaccamaggaṁ passāvamaggaṁ ṭhapetvā adhakkhakaṁ ubbhajāṇumaṇḍalaṁ ādissa vaṇṇampi bhaṇati avaṇṇampi bhaṇati, āpatti thullaccayassa;
analyzed: ▁va cca magg aṃ ▁pass āva magg aṃ ▁ṭhapetvā ▁a dha kkha kaṃ ▁u bbh a j ā ṇu maṇḍal aṃ ▁ādi ssa ▁vaṇṇ ampi ▁bhaṇ ati ▁ avaṇṇ ampi ▁bhaṇ ati ▁āpatti ▁thullaccay assa

original: kāyapaṭibaddhaṁ ādissa vaṇṇampi bhaṇati avaṇṇampi bhaṇati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: ▁kāya paṭibaddh aṃ ▁ādi ssa ▁vaṇṇ ampi ▁bhaṇ ati ▁ avaṇṇ ampi ▁bhaṇ ati ▁āpatti ▁dukkaṭassa

original: Attakāmapāricariyāya vaṇṇaṁ bhāsanapaccayā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati—
analyzed: ▁atta kām a pāri cariyā ya ▁vaṇṇ aṃ ▁bhāsa n apaccayā ▁tisso ▁āpattiyo ▁āpajjati

original: mātugāmassa santike attakāmapāricariyāya vaṇṇaṁ bhāsati, āpatti saṅghādisesassa;
analyzed: ▁mātugām assa ▁santike ▁atta kām a pāri cariyā ya ▁vaṇṇ aṃ ▁bhāsa ti ▁āpatti ▁saṃghādises assa

original: paṇḍakassa santike attakāmapāricariyāya vaṇṇaṁ bhāsati, āpatti thullaccayassa;
analyzed: ▁ paṇḍak assa ▁santike ▁atta kām a pāri cariyā ya ▁vaṇṇ aṃ ▁bhāsa ti ▁āpatti ▁thullaccay assa

original: tiracchānagatassa santike attakāmapāricariyāya vaṇṇaṁ bhāsati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: ▁tiracchānagat assa ▁santike ▁atta kām a pāri cariyā ya ▁vaṇṇ aṃ ▁bhāsa ti ▁āpatti ▁dukkaṭassa

original: Sañcarittaṁ samāpajjanapaccayā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati—
analyzed: ▁s añca rit taṃ ▁samā pajj an apaccayā ▁tisso ▁āpattiyo ▁āpajjati

original: paṭiggaṇhāti vīmaṁsati paccāharati, āpatti saṅghādisesassa;
analyzed: ▁paṭiggaṇh āti ▁vīmaṃs ati ▁pacc ā har ati ▁āpatti ▁saṃghādises assa

original: paṭiggaṇhāti vīmaṁsati na paccāharati, āpatti thullaccayassa;
analyzed: ▁paṭiggaṇh āti ▁vīmaṃs ati ▁na ▁pacc ā har ati ▁āpatti ▁thullaccay assa

original: paṭiggaṇhāti na vīmaṁsati na paccāharati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
Saññācikāya kuṭiṁ kārāpanapaccayā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati—
kārāpeti, payoge dukkaṭaṁ;
ekaṁ piṇḍaṁ anāgate āpatti thullaccayassa;
tasmiṁ piṇḍe āgate āpatti saṅghādisesassa.
Mahallakaṁ vihāraṁ kārāpanapaccayā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati—
kārāpeti, payoge dukkaṭaṁ;
ekaṁ piṇḍaṁ anāgate, āpatti thullaccayassa;
tasmiṁ piṇḍe āgate āpatti saṅghādisesassa.
Bhikkhuṁ amūlakena pārājikena dhammena anuddhaṁsanapaccayā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati—
analyzed: ▁bhikkhuṃ ▁ amūlak ena ▁pārājik ena ▁dhamm ena ▁anu ddh aṃ san apaccayā ▁tisso ▁āpattiyo ▁āpajjati

original: anokāsaṁ kārāpetvā cāvanādhippāyo vadeti, āpatti saṅghādisesena dukkaṭassa;
analyzed: ▁an okāsa ṃ ▁kārāp etvā ▁cā van ā dhippāy o ▁vad eti ▁āpatti ▁saṃghādises ena ▁dukkaṭassa

original: okāsaṁ kārāpetvā akkosādhippāyo vadeti, āpatti omasavādassa.
analyzed: ▁okās aṃ ▁kārāp etvā ▁akkos ā dhippāy o ▁vad eti ▁āpatti ▁ o mas a vād assa

original: Bhikkhuṁ aññabhāgiyassa adhikaraṇassa kiñci desaṁ lesamattaṁ upādāya pārājikena dhammena anuddhaṁsanapaccayā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati—
analyzed: ▁bhikkhuṃ ▁aññ a bhāgiy assa ▁adhikaraṇ assa ▁kiñci ▁des aṃ ▁ les amattaṃ ▁upādāya ▁pārājik ena ▁dhamm ena ▁anu ddh aṃ san apaccayā ▁tisso ▁āpattiyo ▁āpajjati

original: anokāsaṁ kārāpetvā cāvanādhippāyo vadeti, āpatti saṅghādisesena dukkaṭassa;
analyzed: ▁an okāsa ṃ ▁kārāp etvā ▁cā van ā dhippāy o ▁vad eti ▁āpatti ▁saṃghādises ena ▁dukkaṭassa

original: okāsaṁ kārāpetvā akkosādhippāyo vadeti, āpatti omasavādassa.
analyzed: ▁okās aṃ ▁kārāp etvā ▁akkos ā dhippāy o ▁vad eti ▁āpatti ▁ o mas a vād assa

original: Saṅghabhedako bhikkhu yāvatatiyaṁ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjanapaccayā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati—
analyzed: ▁saṃgh abhed ako ▁bhikkhu ▁yāva tatiy aṃ ▁samanu bhās an āya ▁na ▁paṭi ni ssa jj an apaccayā ▁tisso ▁āpattiyo ▁āpajjati

original: ñattiyā dukkaṭaṁ;
dvīhi kammavācāhi thullaccayā;
kammavācāpariyosāne āpatti saṅghādisesassa.
Bhedakānuvattakā bhikkhū yāvatatiyaṁ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjanapaccayā tisso āpattiyo āpajjanti—
analyzed: ▁bhed ak ānu vatta kā ▁bhikkhū ▁yāva tatiy aṃ ▁samanu bhās an āya ▁na ▁paṭi ni ssa jj an apaccayā ▁tisso ▁āpattiyo ▁āpajj anti

original: ñattiyā dukkaṭaṁ;
dvīhi kammavācāhi thullaccayā;
kammavācāpariyosāne āpatti saṅghādisesassa.
Dubbaco bhikkhu yāvatatiyaṁ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjanapaccayā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati—
analyzed: ▁du bb a c o ▁bhikkhu ▁yāva tatiy aṃ ▁samanu bhās an āya ▁na ▁paṭi ni ssa jj an apaccayā ▁tisso ▁āpattiyo ▁āpajjati

original: ñattiyā dukkaṭaṁ;
dvīhi kammavācāhi thullaccayā;
kammavācāpariyosāne āpatti saṅghādisesassa.
Kuladūsako bhikkhu yāvatatiyaṁ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjanapaccayā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati—
analyzed: ▁kul a dūs ako ▁bhikkhu ▁yāva tatiy aṃ ▁samanu bhās an āya ▁na ▁paṭi ni ssa jj an apaccayā ▁tisso ▁āpattiyo ▁āpajjati

original: ñattiyā dukkaṭaṁ;
dvīhi kammavācāhi thullaccayā;
kammavācāpariyosāne āpatti saṅghādisesassa …pe….
Anādariyaṁ paṭicca udake uccāraṁ vā passāvaṁ vā kheḷaṁ vā karaṇapaccayā kati āpattiyo āpajjati?

original: Anādariyaṁ paṭicca udake uccāraṁ vā passāvaṁ vā kheḷaṁ vā karaṇapaccayā ekaṁ āpattiṁ āpajjati.
analyzed: ▁anādar iyaṃ ▁paṭicca ▁udak e ▁ucc ā raṃ ▁vā ▁pass āva ṃ ▁vā ▁kh e ḷ aṃ ▁vā ▁karaṇ apaccayā ▁ekaṃ ▁āpattiṃ ▁āpajjati

original: Dukkaṭaṁ—
anādariyaṁ paṭicca udake uccāraṁ vā passāvaṁ vā kheḷaṁ vā karaṇapaccayā imaṁ ekaṁ āpattiṁ āpajjati.
